unnormalised: The solar rooftop subsidies are a welcome step. However, the application process in some states, like Bihar, needs streamlining. The Rs. 2 lakh subsidy could significantly impact middle-class families, especially in Tier-2 cities like Patna. Perhaps a tie-up with institutions like IIT-Kanpur for technical verification would improve efficiency. Looking forward to seeing more installations after the 15/08/2024 deadline, and an update by 17:00 hrs on 20/07/2024 regarding phase-II implementation. Many await information by 10/10/2024.
